data.text: @eNCA I think there’s a difference between side effects and conditions. Side effects aren’t life threatening and resolves within days but conditions are a lifetime thing.
@ValnusSA @ncube_shadrack @BunnyPolitricks @eNCA Lol people resort to unimaginable thought processes to defend Pfizer... Nonsense.

@eNCA Are you fucking joking? There were 1223 DEATHS on ONE section of that report with over 42000 severe side effects in a 3 month period! Where do you get your information!?
I think is is time we take LEGAL ACTION against media corporations flouting false information!

@ohbehavepls @Prof52752008 @eNCA Im there lol, you should stop parading on people social media with your vaccine lies and acting like God's personal assistance , you think we are going to be fooled just like how your people or your race injected our people with HIV and  vax will deal with your people not us

@ohbehavepls @Prof52752008 @eNCA And that word conspiracy means nothing, nothing at all and also the word antivaxer means nothing at all, we have survived this far without assistance of any vaccine in our lives some of us, so being called antivaxer mean nothing
